item.title: Migrate our wesbites from PHp 5.6.40 to PHP 7.3 - Upwork
item.description:
We have 4-5 websites running on single server. Our current PHP version is 5.6.40. We have laravel for REST APIs for my mobile APP. We are using MySQLi commands, MVC model at certain parts of our website. We wish to upgrade our PHP version to 7.3 at all places so that our websites get compatible with latest version of PHP. As its running site, we want to perform this task in testing server first, and apply it in production server only when everything is done.

1) We want someone who can perform this task for all our websites, backend.
2) What approach will you follow to perform this task?
3) what all will you require from my side?

Budget: $2,000
Posted On: April 09, 2019 07:55 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Web Development
Skills: API, Architecture Design, Backend Rest API, CSS, CSS3, HTML, HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, MS SQL, MySQL Administration, MySQL Programming, PHP, Web Design
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Laravel / Vue SAAS website - Upwork
item.description:
This is a SAAS website that should be built with Laravel Spark and Vue. Please see the attached Word Doc for full details and designs. It is a microlearning application where a teacher subscribes and then creates content (books) in a backend admin panel on a desktop, and their students are able to view the content on a responsive front end on a mobile device (I do not want a native app).

Laravel Spark has the subscription management and payment functions I need, so you shouldn't need to customize anything on those. If you do not already have a license for Spark, please make that clear, I will buy it and transfer it to you, but that will be accounted for in comparing bids. For the subscription management, the author subscribes and chooses how many students they will have and then picks the plan they pay for. After the author creates their first book, they get a link to give to their students. The students register and can view the book at no cost.

You can see a very rough version (with a completely different design) here: http://microlearning.ukr-dev.com/admin#/login User:test@net.net Pass:password
It uses the term Lessons and Topics, instead of Books and Chapters that we will now use.

Budget: $500
Posted On: April 09, 2019 07:55 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Web Development
Skills: Laravel Framework, Vue.js, Website Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: LAMP / Javascript / Laravel / Wordpress Programmer Needed for Ongoing Projects - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a developer to assist with our workload of PHP-based sites, many in Laravel and Wordpress. We've got a few projects running at any one time, and are short-staffed. We need someone reliable, who responds quickly, and is able to grasp our vision for different tasks. An ideal candidate writes clean code, understands Laravel and Wordpress at an expert-level, and keeps to milestone dates and deadlines.

This will be an ongoing position, with varying levels of work each week.

Out of all freelancers that apply, we will select the few that we feel may fit our requirements. Those freelancers will be asked to take a coding test to test their skills (as per Upwork's rules, this will be compensated at $20).


Posted On: April 09, 2019 07:55 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Web Development
Skills: AJAX, Bootstrap, CSS, Custom PHP, HTML, HTML5, Java, JavaScript, jQuery, MySQL Administration, PHP, WordPress
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Need to Create a affiliated website - Upwork
item.description:
Develop a website that offers two things:
1. FOREX signals (Please refer to www.fxprofitsignals.io & www.pipsalert.com)
2. Digital marketing services (Please refer to www.odigits.io)
Both are subscription based with 3 different packages: USD60, USD120 and USD240 per month.

Below link is what the client has in mind in terms of look and organization, but recommended we find another equal and better looking template with a business look still:
https://themeforest.net/item/financial-services-hub-business-corporate-html-theme/17867047
There should be Monthly option and annual option for subscription. The annual subscription will save 10% versus monthly.
The option of the USD240 will include subscription for both services the Digital Marketing and getting the FOREX signals.

Create a structure for affiliation marketing program for the above two business streams "FOREX signals" and "Digital Marketing services":
Meaning a customer can recommend another customer and if the other customer joins and pays, then the original customer gets 50% of the subscription for the first time only, then if the customer continues, he gets 30% instead of 50% and every month he gets 30%. Once the second customer invites in a new customer, he himself will get 50%  and then 30%, but the person above him gets 30% of the person below the one below him.
In other words, each person will be rewarded for 2 layers of customers under him.

For the Digital Marketing services, when the customer choose one of the packages 60$ or 120$ or 240$ he will then be taken to a screen where he will have a drop menu of the 5 Digital Marketing services and he can choose 2 services for the 60$ or 4 services for the 120$ or Full list of services for the 240$. The list will contain: Local SEO, Email marketing, social media marketing, Pay Per Click, YouTube advertising, Search Engine Optimization Please refer to services tab on https://www.odigits.io.

Create a calculator to see how much you earn. Please refer to calculator under www.odigits.io.

www.gourl.io is the website we can source bitcoin payment gateway as per the client needs.

We need to show like currency FOREX table on the landing page.
Also customers if they sign in, in their zone, they should see a tree diagram of who is under them (in terms of affiliates) as this is how they will be paid on a monthly basis. They should see also who is active or not active.

The marketing affiliation program should show 2 levels of subscribers only with their photos. (Please refer to the word attached document)

Client is expecting 10,000 subscribers to his program and it is a global targeting.

Budget: $400
Posted On: April 09, 2019 07:55 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Web Development
Skills: API, API Integration, Bitcoin, HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, Laravel Framework, Payment Gateway Integration, PHP, Website Development
Country: Nepal
click to apply

item.title: Laravel/Lumen expert for a position as a senior PHP to build and research/development new features - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

For candidates who can work on CET +1 from 8 am to 6 am!

In this role, you will be working researching new and innovative technology for products before creating prototypes and the associated documentation to be able to pass over to us for implementation.

A curious and detail-oriented mindset is vital as you will need to keep up to speed with current and future technologies and best practices. In addition to this, the ability to work quickly and effectively in frequently fast-changing situations is crucial.

The ideal candidate for this role has experience working as a PHP Developer with modern PHP frameworks (e.g. Laravel, Symfony or Lumen) and databases (e.g. MySQL), as well as with API’s.

**Responsibilities**

- Undertaking continuous research and analysis of new trends and techniques to ensure that we are able to use the latest developments in order to continue to grow

- Developing small-scale prototypes and proofs of concept, which may later be scaled-up to full-scale solutions

- Creating documentation for these prototypes to provide a seamless handover to the development teams

**Hiring Process**
Interesting candidates will be asked to prove their abilities and level in a task.

Thank you


Posted On: April 09, 2019 07:55 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Web Development
Skills: API, Automatic Test, Backend Rest API, Laravel Framework, Lumen Micro Framework, MySQL Administration, MySQL Programming, PHP, SQLite Administration, Test Cases, Testing
Country: Denmark
click to apply

item.title: Full Stack Dev - needed to complete custom software and website, ongoing - Upwork
item.description:
I need a Full Stack Developer to jump in and complete and existing project that is almost done.

- Framework is Laravel, as well as PHP & Javascript - is required
- need engines completed, bugs fixed and the front end built to go live.

- This is version 1.0, once live and running clean, i want to move on to many other add ons and off shoot softwares.

This could potentially be a full time thing so i am looking for someone who is :
- Fluent in english
- honest
- awesome problem solver/creative
- willing to work with a tracker to monitor progress
- ok with open communication/explaining with me as we go along.
- flexible hours, once live, if issues (site goes down, server issues etc) I'd need to have you jump on the problem and fix it asap, so customers are not inconvenienced.

I can get more into detail and am open to profit sharing once we are live as i need a team i can trust and who has a vested interested in this.

If you are ok with all of these requirements, then please get back to me, if you have any issues with any, thank you for reading this post.

FYI - i am also open to suggestions as i am not a developer, so we can figure things out based on your experience and expertise.


Posted On: April 09, 2019 07:55 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Web Development
Skills: API Integration, Custom PHP, Database Architecture, e-Commerce Website, Laravel Framework, PHP, Redux for JavaScript, Web Design, Website Development
Country: Canada
click to apply

A site to browse and chat with other users

Site needs to be responsive. Work for mobile, tablets and desktop.
Extra services needed: Customization

Extra notes: I don’t mind if you use an existing script/plugins/themes to build this site. It doesn’t have to be custom built.

When applying please write the word sunrise on the top of your cover letter and then tell me what your plan of action will be. item.title: Multiple PHP Backend Web Developers Needed for an E-commerce Project INDIVIDUALS ONLY (NO AGENCIES) - Upwork
item.description:
This ad is for INDIVIDUALS ONLY, please if you are an agency or an agency member, PLEASE DO NOT APPLY. Agencies will be automatically rejected.

Please note invitations are sent by non-technical members, therefore please review the work even if you were invited. We are inviting as many candidates as possible so you do not sacrifice your connects in case of interest. Do not feel pressured to accept if you were invited. If you feel the project isn't right for you, you may decline the offer.

We would like to build a team of developers to build an e-commerce website from scratch similar to Amazon, Ebay & Newegg. The premise is a website where third party sellers can sign up and start selling with us.

The technical requirements:

PHP Developers with the following skill sets:
• Have created plug-ins for tools like Laravel, Framework (Must). Extensive experience on PHP
• PHP Web Development Skills include: PHP, JavaScript , VueJS, JQuery, JSON, Bootstrap.
• Experience to full LAMP stack
• Demonstrable knowledge of XML, XHTML, CSS, Modules i.e. API integration, XML with a focus on standards.
• Write clean and well-engineered source code that complies with Laravel Best Practices.
• Strong experience of Unit Testing (including standard testing frameworks)
• Experience of AWS and/or DevOps
• Previous experience of working on ECommerce Projects, Payment Gateway Integrations (Must), Exposure to Web Projects, REST Services is desirable
• Communicate with technical leads, project managers and other teammates.
• Must be able to work with minimum supervision.
• The code should be written using Laravel framework provided functions:
$model→findOrCreate() or $model→updateOrCreate should be preferred over self-created code.


Applying for the job:
- You will be given daily tasks and get paid weekly based on the performance, not hourly and not on how long it took you to learn something
- When you apply for this project, you agree that all schematics that will be provided is a property of ZeeMoe, LLC of Delaware, US & ZeeMeo, LLC of Delaware, US and that any reproduction, copying of ideas and/or replication of any kind may result in legal liability to you. You also agree that you are not to commit any action that could result in harm knowingly and/or intentionally.
- Every member will be paid $400 per month part time
- Minimal guidance and assistance will be offered from project management
- This is NOT a WordPress project, if your experience is mostly with that, this project is not compatible with your skills


To apply please complete this example (if you do not feel comfortable with completing the example, please show us few lines of code you've written to see if you are a good fit):
Please create a new record with Controller's method and Validation following Laravel Best Practice
The "Product" Model (Products similar to those you see on websites like Amazon and E-bay) will consist of 3 fields:
- Name
- Description
- Price
Each field is required; name is unique string, with max 100 characters; description should fit in to MySQL text type; price should be Float with 2 decimals.
Write down explanation to why you coded this way (your thought process or coding).

Please use your original work. When you don't do so, you will struggle with our tasks, and eventually you will just be wasting our time and yours.

If you get accepted, you will be asked to sign an NDA and receive a test contract to see if you are able to work or not. We will send you initial work contract (real work, not example) to see how your codes and adherence to deadline look and this will decide if you will be part of final team.


Posted On: April 09, 2019 07:55 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Web Development
Skills: AngularJS, Bootstrap, CSS, HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, Laravel Framework, Node.js, PHP, Vue.js, Web Design, Website Development
Country: Egypt
click to apply

item.title: Laravel guru needed - Upwork
item.description:
Hi freelancers,
I need the full-stack developer to create a website from scratch. It must be a booking system for a restaurant, which requires the implementation of complicated logic. I need an opportunity to avoid a big number of empty places at the restaurant. For example, the user has an opportunity to reserve a table for four people, if in this group at least 3 people.
I want to build it using Laravel on back-end and Vue.js on front-end. Also, I'm able to consider using Vue.js or React.
Details will be given to freelancer, who provide me with similar websites and code examples


Posted On: April 09, 2019 07:55 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Web Development
Skills: JavaScript, Laravel Framework, PHP, Vue.js, Website Development
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: PHP, MySQL, Laravel Tutorial videos - Upwork
item.description:
We're a leading company in the world of e-learning with 1 Million students worldwide and we're looking for our next talent to create courses. Our courses are mainly recorded using a screencast software and a microphone.  

Along with the fixed price, you'll also appear publicly on the course and receive 15% of the sales income in exchange for answering students' questions and updating the course regularly.

Right now we are looking for experienced and enthusiastic professionals to create interesting and engaging video tutorials on courses related to PHP, MySQL and Laravel. The courses will include hands on practical knowledge and explanations as well as code snippets and quizzes wherever required. The courses should in include real-case scenarios and practical projects.

It will be an ongoing regular work. The ideal candidate will be a dynamic professional who can pick up new and upcoming technologies and present them to users in a simplified form. The applicant should be fluent in English

Budget: $5,000
Posted On: April 09, 2019 07:55 UTC
Category: Web, Mobile & Software Dev > Web Development
Skills: Laravel Framework, MySQL Administration, MySQL Programming, PHP
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Developer needed for ongoing php / mysql / Javascript / JQuery /Laravel work. - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a developer for ongoing work.
The work is 80% project work, the rest is updates and fixes to existing systems. The work is varied and interesting.

*Essential skills*
Strong OOP php
Strong Sql ( almost all MySql )
Competent Javascript
Competent JQuery
Version control, preferably GIT

*Nice to have*
Complex sql - data manipulation, import / export / cleansing
Laravel (  4 and 5 )
Bootstrap / responsive websites
CSS
Magento
Wordpress
LAMP
api
Amazon / eBay integration

An experienced .net Ionic developer to complete the front end of our mobile app (we currently have the ui/ux design complete and the ui development completed in ionic) pending linking it with our backend which is currently being developed using laravel.
We are creating a first of its kind app in Egypt that will disrupt the current market and change the face of Egyptian laundry forever.
We're looking to start immediately.
MVP:
1- Register
2- Login
3- Home
4- Address Book
5- Create Order
6- My Orders
7- Price List
8- Special Preferences
